summary: ASML is a Dutch company that makes special machines to create computer chips. It's the biggest supplier of these machines worldwide, especially for the newest, most advanced chips. Founded in 1984, ASML is now worth over $397 billion, making it Europe's most valuable tech company. Its headquarters are in the Netherlands, and it has over 42,000 employees from many countries. ASML works with thousands of suppliers and serves customers globally, with offices in Europe, America, and Asia. It's listed on two major stock exchanges, AEX and NASDAQ.
title: ASML Holding
